references: Rosenberg, A. L.; Profile numbers. Fibonacci Quart. 17 (1979), no. 3, 259-264.

prog: (Haskell)a049063 n k = a049063_tabf !! n !! ka133457_row n = a049063_tabf !! na049063_tabf = [1] : iterate f [1, 1] where   f row = 1 : 2 : zipWith (+) ( map (* 2) row) ((tail row) ++ [0])-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 12 2013
